law.catch_line: The corporators shall sign articles of incorporation for the religious corporation. These articles s...

section.section: The corporators shall sign articles of incorporation for the religious corporation. These articles shall contain the information required by Part I of this subtitle.
At least three of the corporators shall acknowledge the articles.

text.section: The corporators shall file the articles with the Department in the same manner and with the same effect as provided in Part I of this subtitle.
